name: 王耀德
objective: 本課程將介紹：(1)光波導之模態、理論及製程技術，(2)光波導之損耗與光藕合，(3)光的調制原理及應用(包括各種主、被動元件)，(4)半導體雷射之原理、結構及製作，(5)光偵測器，(6)積體光學的應用與發展。
schedule:
1:Ch-1, Introduction
2-3:Ch-2, Optical Waveguide Modes
4-5:Ch-3, Theory of Optical Waveguides
5-6:Ch-4, Waveguide Fabrication Techniques
7:Ch-6, Losses in Optical Waveguides
8:Ch-7, Waveguide Input and Output Couplers
9:Review and Midterm Exam
10:Ch-8, Coupling Between Waveguides
11:Ch-9, Electro-Optic Modulators
12:Ch-10, Acousto-Optic Modulators
13:Ch-11, Basic Principles of Light Emission in Semiconductors
14:Ch-12, Semiconductor Lasers
15:Ch-13 ~ 16, Optical Amplifiers & Lasers
16:Ch-17 ~ 18, Integrated Optical Detectors & Quantum-Well Devices
17:Final Reports
18:Final Exam.
scorePolicy:
Mid-term Exam: 30%
Final Exam: 30%
Final Report: 30%
Participation: 10%
materials: Textbook: Integrated Optics, by R. G. Hunsperger, 5th ed.
